verbs.description: In an exclusive interview with ‘ Meet the Press,’ Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) [V: is] defending journalists’ freedoms and a strong democracy following President Donald Trump ’s frequent attacks on the fourth estate , including a tweet last week that certain media outlets are ‘ the enemy of the American People.’ Without a free press , McCain said , ‘ I am afraid that we would lose so much of our individual liberties over time . That 's how dictators get started.’ Watch the interview with McCain on ' Meet the Press . '
